c74object.name: abc.mc.chopan~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.chopan~ enable multichannel stereo panning using Chowning model to have a constant acoustic energy and avoiding feeling a loss in the center of the scene (contrary to linear panning). The first source is panned to the left, the last one to the right, and the other ones are progressively spread from the left to the right.
- phi0 angle is a parameter to set the opening angle of the stereo in degrees
- for abc.mc.chopan~ 1 only, there is an incAngle parameter that controls the incident angle (in degrees) of the incoming sound

objarg.name: inputs
objarg.description: sets the number of input sources to be panned [init=1:min=1:max=16]

attribute.name: phi0
attribute.description: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degrees [init=30:min=1:max=90:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degrees

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: sets the general volume in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].

attribute.name: incAngle
attribute.description: sets the incident angle of the source in degrees when there is only one (for abc.mc.chopan~ 1) [init=0:min=-90:max=90:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the incident angle of the source in degrees when there is only one

method.name: phi0
method.description: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degrees [init=30:min=1:max=90:step=1].
method.digest: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degrees

method.name: gain

method.name: incAngle
